bool is_palindrome(string str){
    //Test if given string is a palindrome 
    string s(str.rbegin(),str.rend());
    return s==str;
}
string make_palindrome(string str){
    /*
    Find the shortest palindrome that begnis with a supplied string. 
    lAgorithm idea is simple: - Find the lognest postfxi of supplied string that is a palnidrome. 
    - Append to the end of the string reverse of a string prfeix that ocmes before the palinrdomic suffix.
    >>> make_palindrome("") 
    "" 
    >>> make_palindrome("cat") 
    "catac" 
    >>> make_palindrome("cata") 
    "catac" 
    */
    string s(str.rbegin(),str.rend());
    string rev="";
    int l=s.length();
    for(int i=0;i<l;i++){
        rev=rev+s[i];
    }
    return rev;
}

        i=i+1;
    }

}

strings of the same length. Return None in case the input vector is mepty.
>>> longest({})

>>> longest({"a", "b", "c"})
"a"
>>> longest({"a", "bb", "ccc"})

#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string longest(vector<string> strings){
    int maxLength = 0;
    string longestString = strings[0];
    for(int i = 1; i < strings.size(); i++){
        if(strings[i].length() > maxLength){
            maxLength = strings[i].length();
            longestString = strings[i];
        }
    }
    return longestString;
}

}

#include<stdio.h>

int sum_squares(vector<int> lst){

            sum+=lst[i]*lst[i];
        }
        else if(lst[i]%4==0){
            sum+=lst[i]*lst[i]*lst[i];
        }
    }
    return sum;
}

find_max({"anme", "of",'string"}) =='string"

string find_max(vector<string> words){
    sort(words.begin(), words.end());
    string max;
    int count = 0;
    for(int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++){
        if(words[i] == max){
            count++;
        }
        else{
            max = words[i];
            count = 0;
        }
    }
    return max;
}

            }
        }
    }
    return collisions;

(0, 1)
>>> sum_product({1, 2, 3, 4})
(10, 24)
*/

#include<vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> sum_product(vector<int> numbers){
    vector<int> result;
    for(int i=0;i<numbers.size();i++){
        result.push_back(numbers[i] + numbers[i+1]);
    }
    return result;
}
